title: Hassen Allegue
text: I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at the Maurice Lamontagne Institute in Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada, with Fisheries and Oceans Canada. My research focuses on recent changes in white shark presence in Atlantic Canadian waters and their interactions with grey seals. To address this ecological question, I use acoustic and satellite telemetry technologies.

title: Hassen Allegue
text:
